EmailTemplate.name: FULFILLMENT RESPONSE TO MEMBER
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Recent ICCU Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
I am sorry to hear that we did not send you exactly what you were requesting. We received this request from the agent you worked with, ...... The request was to...... I believe that is what was sent. However,
Please review the attachment and let me know if there is anything that needs to be changed or corrected.
We apologize again for the miscommunication. It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
